A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: When I left the cinema the whole experience was weird\, Nobody said anything and seen silent faces leaving the theater. I wasn't sure what to think as my brother hasn't said anything . So I asked after a while a long silence. \"So? What do you think?\" And he said \"Utter shit\". After these words I was so relieved as I thought that I was the only one who disliked the movie. Now I understand the facial expressions on the faces of people who had nothing to say when leaving. Very Disappointing movie.
